column1: '''''Children's and Illustrated Books, Modern First Editions''''' is a book auction catalogue from Dominic Winter. It includes a letter by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]: [[Letter to Agatha Carew Hunt]], reproduced in a photograph.<ref>{{webcite
